channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Coming soon and Maintenance mode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Coming soon and Maintenance mode

item.title: CVE-2021-24577|2024-08-03T19:35:20.255Z -- unknown -- coming%20soon%20and%20maintenance%20mode
item.description: The Coming soon and Maintenance mode WordPress plugin before 3.5.3 does not properly sanitize inputs submitted by authenticated users when setting adding or modifying coming soon or maintenance mode pages, leading to stored XSS.
